verses.verse: Now <WG1161> it came to pass<WG1096>, while<WG1722> the multitude<WG3793> pressed upon<WG1945> him<WG846> and heard<WG191> the word<WG3056> of God<WG2532>, that<WG2258> he<WG846> was standing<WG2476> by<WG3844> the lake<WG3041> of Gennesaret<WG1082>;

and <WG2532> he saw<WG1492> two<WG1417> boats<WG4143> standing<WG2476> by<WG3844> the lake<WG3041>: but<WG1161> the fishermen<WG231> had gone out<WG576> of<WG575> them<WG846>, and were washing<WG637> their nets<WG1350>.

And <WG1161> he entered<WG1684> into<WG1519> one<WG1520> of the boats<WG4143>, which<WG3739> was<WG2258> Simon<WG4613>'s, and asked<WG2065> him<WG846> to put out<WG1877> a little<WG3641> from<WG575> the land<WG1093>. And<WG2532> he sat down<WG2523> and taught<WG1321> the multitudes<WG3793> out of<WG1537> the boat<WG4143>.

And <WG1161> when<WG5613> he had left<WG3973> speaking<WG2980>, he said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> Simon<WG4613>, Put out<WG1877> into<WG1519> the deep<WG899>, and<WG2532> let down<WG5465> your<WG5216> nets<WG1350> for<WG1519> a draught<WG61>.

And <WG2532> Simon<WG4613> answered<WG2036> and said<WG2036>, Master<WG1988>, we toiled2872, 1223 all<WG3650> night<WG3571>, and took<WG2983> nothing<WG3762>: but<WG1161> at<WG1909> thy<WG4675> word<WG4487> I will let down<WG5465> the nets<WG1350>.
And <WG2532> when they had<WG4160> done<WG4160> this<WG5124>, they inclosed<WG4788> a great<WG4183> multitude<WG4128> of fishes<WG2486>; and<WG1161> their<WG846> nets<WG1350> were breaking<WG1284>;

and <WG2532> they beckoned<WG2656> unto<WG3353> their partners3353, 3588 in<WG1722> the other<WG2087> boat<WG4143>, that they should come<WG2064> and<WG2532> help<WG4815> them<WG846>. And<WG2532> they came<WG2064>, and<WG2532> filled<WG4130> both<WG297> the boats<WG4143>, so that<WG5620> they<WG846> began to sink<WG1036>.

But Simon<WG4613> Peter<WG4074>, when<WG1161> he saw<WG1492> it<WG4363>, fell down at Jesus<WG2424>' knees<WG1119>, saying<WG3004>, Depart<WG1831> from<WG575> me<WG1700>; for<WG3754> I am<WG1510> a sinful<WG268> man<WG435>, O Lord<WG2962>.

For <WG1063> he<WG846> was<WG4023> amazed<WG2285>, and<WG2532> all<WG3956> that<WG3588> were with<WG4862> him<WG846>, at<WG1909> the draught<WG61> of the fishes<WG2486> which<WG3739> they had taken<WG4815>;

and <WG1161> so<WG3668> were also<WG2532> James<WG2385> and<WG2532> John<WG2491>, sons<WG5207> of Zebedee<WG2199>, who<WG3739> were<WG2258> partners<WG2844> with<WG3588> Simon<WG4613>. And<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> Simon<WG4613>, Fear<WG5399> not<WG3361>; from<WG575> henceforth<WG3568> thou shalt<WG2071> catch<WG2221> men<WG444>.
And <WG2532> when they had brought<WG2609> their<WG3588> boats<WG4143> to<WG1909> land<WG1093>, they left<WG863> all<WG537>, and followed<WG190> him<WG846>.

And <WG2532> it came to pass<WG1096>, while<WG1722> he<WG846> was<WG1511> in<WG1722> one<WG1520> of the cities<WG2532>, behold<WG2400>, a man<WG435> full<WG4134> of leprosy<WG2532>: and when he saw<WG1492> Jesus<WG2424>, he fell<WG4098> on<WG1909> his face<WG4383>, and besought<WG1189> him<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, Lord<WG2962>, if<WG1437> thou wilt<WG2309>, thou canst<WG1410> make<WG2511> me<WG3165> clean<WG2511>.

And <WG2532> he stretched forth<WG1614> his hand<WG5495>, and<WG2532> touched<WG680> him<WG846>, saying<WG2036>, I will<WG2309>; be thou made clean<WG2511>. And<WG2532> straightway<WG2112> the leprosy<WG3014> departed<WG565> from<WG575> him<WG846>.

And <WG2532> he<WG846> charged<WG3853> him<WG846> to tell<WG2036> no man<WG3367>: but<WG235> go<WG565> thy way<WG1166>, and show thyself<WG4572> to the priest<WG2409>, and<WG2532> offer<WG4374> for<WG4012> thy<WG4675> cleansing<WG2512>, according as<WG2531> Moses<WG3475> commanded<WG4367>, for<WG1519> a testimony<WG3142> unto them<WG846>.

But <WG1161> so much the more<WG3123> went<WG1330> abroad<WG1330> the report<WG3056> concerning<WG4012> him<WG846>: and<WG2532> great<WG4183> multitudes<WG3793> came together<WG4905> to hear<WG191>, and<WG2532> to be healed<WG2323> of<WG575> their<WG846> infirmities<WG769>.
But <WG1161> he<WG2258> withdrew<WG5298> himself<WG846> in<WG1722> the deserts<WG2048>, and<WG2532> prayed<WG4336>.

And <WG2532> it came to pass<WG1096> on<WG1722> one<WG1520> of those days<WG2250>, that<WG2532> he<WG846> was<WG2258> teaching<WG1321>; and<WG2532> there were<WG2258> Pharisees<WG5330> and<WG2532> doctors of the law<WG3547> sitting by<WG2521>, who<WG3739> were<WG2258> come<WG2064> out<WG1537> of every<WG3956> village<WG2968> of Galilee<WG1056> and<WG2532> Judaea<WG2449> and<WG2532> Jerusalem<WG2419>: and<WG2532> the power<WG1411> of the Lord<WG2962> was<WG2258> with him to<WG1519> heal<WG2390>.

And <WG2532> behold<WG2400>, men<WG435> bring<WG5342> on<WG1909> a bed<WG2825> a man<WG444> that was<WG2258> palsied<WG3886>: and<WG2532> they sought<WG2212> to bring<WG1533> him<WG846> in<WG1533>, and<WG2532> to lay<WG5087> him<WG846> before<WG1799> him<WG846>.

And <WG2532> not<WG3361> finding<WG2147> by<WG1223> what<WG4169> way they might bring<WG1533> him<WG846> in<WG1533> because of<WG1223> the multitude<WG3793>, they went<WG305> up to<WG1909> the housetop<WG1430>, and let<WG2524> him<WG846> down<WG2524> through<WG1223> the tiles<WG2766> with<WG4862> his couch<WG2826> into<WG1519> the midst<WG3319> before<WG1715> Jesus<WG2424>.
And <WG2532> seeing<WG1492> their<WG846> faith<WG4102>, he said<WG2036>, Man<WG444>, thy<WG4675> sins<WG266> are forgiven<WG863> thee<WG4671>.

And <WG2532> the scribes<WG1122> and<WG2532> the Pharisees<WG5330> began<WG756> to reason<WG1260>, saying<WG3004>, Who<WG5101> is<WG2076> this<WG3778> that<WG3739> speaketh<WG2980> blasphemies<WG988>? Who<WG5101> can<WG1410> forgive<WG863> sins<WG1487>, but<WG3361> God<WG2316> alone<WG3441>?

But <WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> perceiving<WG1921> their<WG846> reasonings<WG1261>, answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> them<WG846>, Why<WG5101> reason ye<WG1260> in<WG1722> your<WG5216> hearts<WG2588>?
Which <WG5101> is<WG2076> easier<WG2123>, to say<WG2036>, Thy<WG4675> sins<WG266> are forgiven<WG863> thee<WG4671>; or<WG2228> to say<WG2036>, Arise<WG1453> and<WG2532> walk<WG4043>?

But <WG1161> that<WG2443> ye may know<WG1492> that<WG3754> the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> hath<WG2192> authority<WG1849> on<WG1909> earth<WG1093> to forgive<WG863> sins<WG266> (he said<WG2036> unto him that was palsied<WG3886>), I say<WG3004> unto thee<WG4671>, Arise<WG1453>, and<WG2532> take up<WG142> thy<WG4675> couch<WG2826>, and go<WG4198> unto<WG1519> thy<WG4675> house<WG3624>.

And <WG2532> immediately<WG3916> he rose up<WG450> before<WG1799> them<WG846>, and took<WG142> up<WG1909> that<WG3739> whereon he lay<WG2621>, and departed<WG565> to<WG1519> his<WG846> house<WG3624>, glorifying<WG1392> God<WG2316>.

And <WG2532> amazement<WG1611> took hold<WG2983> on all<WG537>, and<WG2532> they glorified<WG1392> God<WG2316>; and<WG2532> they were filled<WG4130> with fear<WG5401>, saying<WG3754>, We have seen<WG1492> strange things<WG3861> to-day<WG4594>.

And after<WG3326> these things<WG5023> he went forth<WG1831>, and<WG2532> beheld<WG2300> a publican<WG5057>, named<WG3686> Levi<WG3018>, sitting<WG2521> at<WG1909> the place of toll<WG5058>, and<WG2532> said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, Follow<WG190> me<WG3427>.
And <WG2532> he forsook<WG2641> all<WG537>, and rose up<WG450> and followed<WG190> him<WG846>.

And <WG2532> Levi<WG3018> made<WG4160> him<WG846> a great<WG3173> feast<WG1403> in<WG1722> his<WG846> house<WG3614>: and<WG2532> there was<WG2258> a great<WG4183> multitude<WG3793> of publicans<WG5057> and<WG2532> of others<WG243> that<WG3739> were<WG2258> sitting at meat<WG2621> with<WG3326> them<WG846>.

And <WG2532> the Pharisees<WG5330> and<WG2532> their<WG846> scribes<WG1122> murmured<WG1111> against<WG4314> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>, saying<WG1223>, Why<WG5101> do ye eat<WG2068> and<WG2532> drink<WG4095> with<WG3326> the publicans<WG5057> and<WG2532> sinners<WG268>?

And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> answering<WG611> said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> them<WG846>, They<WG3588> that are in health<WG5198> have<WG2192> no<WG3756> need<WG5532> of a physician<WG2395>; but<WG235> they<WG3588> that are<WG2192> sick<WG2560>.
I am not<WG3756> come<WG2064> to call<WG2564> the righteous<WG1342> but<WG235> sinners<WG268> to<WG1519> repentance<WG3341>.

And they said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> him<WG1223>, The<WG5101> disciples<WG3101> of John<WG2491> fast<WG3522> often<WG4437>, and<WG2532> make<WG4160> supplications<WG1162>; <WG2532> likewise<WG3668> also the disciples of the Pharisees<WG5330>; but<WG1161> thine<WG4674> eat<WG2068> and<WG2532> drink<WG4095>.

And <WG1161> Jesus said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> them<WG3361>, Can ye<WG1410> make<WG4160> the sons<WG5207> of the bride-chamber<WG3567> fast<WG3522>, while<WG1722> the<WG3739> bridegroom<WG3566> is<WG2076> with<WG3326> them<WG846>?

But <WG1161> the days<WG2250> will come<WG2532>; and when<WG3752> the bridegroom<WG3566> shall be taken away<WG522> from<WG575> them<WG846>, then<WG5119> will they fast<WG3522> in<WG1722> those<WG1565> days<WG2250>.

And <WG1161> he spake<WG3004> also<WG2532> a parable<WG3850> unto<WG4314> them<WG3754>: No man<WG3762> rendeth<WG1911> a piece<WG1915> from a new<WG2537> garment<WG2440> and putteth it upon<WG1909> an old<WG2440> garment<WG1487>; else<WG3361> he<WG1161> will rend<WG4977> the new<WG2537>, and<WG2532> also<WG2532> the piece1915, 575 from<WG575> the new<WG2537> will not<WG3756> agree<WG4856> with the old<WG3820>.

And <WG2532> no man<WG3762> putteth<WG906> new<WG3501> wine<WG3631> into<WG1519> old<WG3820> wine-skins<WG779>; else<WG1161> the<WG3361> new<WG3501> wine<WG3631> will burst<WG4486> the skins<WG779>, and<WG2532> itself will be spilled<WG1632>, and<WG2532> the skins<WG779> will perish<WG622>.
But <WG235> new<WG3501> wine<WG3631> must be put<WG992> into<WG1519> fresh<WG2537> wine-skins<WG779>.
And no man<WG3762> having<WG2532> drunk<WG4095> old<WG3820> wine<WG2112> desireth<WG2309> new<WG3501>; for<WG1063> he saith<WG3004>, The old<WG3820> is<WG2076> good<WG5543>.
